text:
@KimDotcom Ahuh.  So I guess we now have all robot run farms and power/water/sewage right?  Oh wait.
I guess the reality that all deaths are now listed covid19 means it's really deadly...oh wait I'm even accounting for this it's a MILD flu season.  Hmm, AI tracking requires 6ft for accuracy
